head.title: David Della Rossa - FutartisticHub
head.description: David Della Rossa, from electronic music, through photography, to computer art, with a bit of chemistry, too.
head.keywords: art, technology, future, artists, photographers, painters, developers, art-lovers, future-lovers, technology-lovers

body.title: David Della Rossa
body.subtitle: I don't know if I'm really an artist or not. I don't care. When I work on my pieces, what drives me is the enjoyment I feel in those moments. Nothing more.
